correct_outliers.py¶

correct_outliers.correct_outliers(data_df, x_df, y_df, method='Z-Score')¶
Parameters

  • data_df – A DataFrame which holds all of the data we will be detecting outliers in

  • x_df – A DataFrame of the x coordinates of the grid

  • y_df – A DataFrame of the y coordinates of the grid

  • method – The method to remove outliers by, must be “Z-Score” or “IQR” as of right now

Returns

A DataFrame without outliers

Removes the outliers inside of the data_df DataFrame and corrects them according to the data around them in their grid.
